title: Which font is used in GAS Jeans logo
content:
Hi,

I tried to search over Internet but couldn't find which font is used in the GAS logo. I want to know the exact font or very close match to the text "GAS" as I am writing a post about [Most famous fashion & accessories brands logos & fonts they use](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082014/http:/freebee.graphics/most-famous-fashion-logo-designs-11-3-14/)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Gas.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082014/http:/typophile.com/files/Gas.jpg) | 30.74 KB |
author: ddpaladiya

comments.content:
GAS is close to [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082014/http:/www.identifont.com/show?3B0K) by Aldo Novarese.  
The subline is [FF DIN](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317082014/http:/www.identifont.com/show?K9) by Albert-Jan Pool.
